reviewText: It was great!! All the songs were beautiful I really miss seeing Geroge. He had a voice like no other.
always enjoy George, Miss him even tho' we did not know him .

I loved it and hope they make a lot of sales for it. Now we can have the gentle giant with us whenever we want to hear him. But of
course I do have all of Celtic Thunder's DVD's as well. I think I purchased most of them from Amazon. Maybe 2 or 3 from Celtic
Thunder store itself.
Yes
A very touching collection showcasing George's tremendous talent.  I am really glad that this DVD was assembled for us to enjoy and remember a fine performer.
Wonderful
It was a present...and she loved it. A real Celtic Thunder fan, she has really been touched by George's death and this was a nice tribute project for her. Thanks....
Loved it
I'll never forget this very talented man. I have ALL Celtic Thunder DVDs and view them often. I've only have George's for two weeks and have about worn it out. It's everything I could have asked for!
JUST WHAT I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE, AWESOME.

Had not heard "Seven Drunken Nights" before (but we will find its dvd and buy it too) - we laughed till we cried.  I can only imagine going to a pub in Scotland on a weekend evening and having the thrill of being entertained by George.  RIP, good man.
Celtic Thunder if a great memorial to the great George Donaldson. Everyone who was fan of his will continue to play the cd & dvd for years to come. Thank you,frances vomer
Great memories of a great entertainer
This DVD is terrific. I love it
I was very pleased, played well. Shipped has promised.
I I miss  George
Just love George's voice..he is missed.
Another thoroughly enjoyable Celtic Thunder DVD.
Very happy with the George DVD... Love the songs on it..
Excellent tribute to George.  Thank you.
Sorry, there isn't more music available by this artist.  He was taken from us way  too soon.  One of the smoothest voices I ever heard.
My Grandma loves it.
gORGE IS something!  We will miss him!
